author: aloeliger
body:
#### PR description:

Taken from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44436.

> This PR changes the L1T CICADA function model to be local the function where it is used, where it is hoped that the potential bug seen in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44435, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44397, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44433. No change is expected to CICADA, however it is hoped that Trigger changes for AXOL1Tl might be seen (becoming more reasonable and removing the possible collision issue).

@mmusich & @artlbv 

#### PR validation:

Tests in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44436. reveal that AXO no-longer triggers all events in 14_1

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

<!-- Please replace this text with any link to the master PR, or the intended backport release cycle numbers -->

This PR is a backport to 14_0
title: [14_0] Change CICADA model to be function local
